Backup is an essential part of digital life, and it's great that you're taking proactive steps to secure your files. Your 1TB WD external hard drive is a great investment, and $59.99 is a fantastic price for the capacity and brand.

Remember to set up a regular backup schedule to ensure your files are consistently protected. You can set reminders or automate the process using backup software to make it a habit. It's also a good idea to store your external hard drive in a safe location, away from moisture, extreme temperatures, and physical damage.

When you start backing up your files, make sure to:

1. Create a backup of your important files, such as documents, photos, and videos.
2. Set up a regular backup schedule to ensure your files are consistently updated.
3. Verify the integrity of your backups to ensure they're complete and recoverable.
4. Consider using the 3-2-1 backup rule: three copies of your data, stored on two different types of media, with one copy offsite (e.g., cloud storage).

By following these best practices, you'll be well on your way to securing your files and enjoying peace of mind.
